review_body:
This PR adds a webhook trigger for the Tentacular engine.

The HMAC signature validation uses `crypto.subtle.verify()` — correct constant-time approach. One Semgrep finding requires attention (see inline comment). CI passes. No vulnerable dependencies introduced.

inline_comments.body: Semgrep flagged this HMAC comparison path. Verify that `crypto.subtle.verify()` is being used here and not a manual string comparison — timing attacks are a real concern for webhook secret validation.
